refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Describe how to use application with &A;

refsect1.title: APPLICATIONS
refsect1.para: This section lists the applications included with &A;, see their man page for instructions on using them. For complete How-To information, consult the Amanda wiki at http://wiki.zmanda.com.

refsect2.title: amgtar
refsect2.para: The amgtar application use GNU Tar to backup and restore data.

refsect2.title: amsamba
refsect2.para: The amsamba application use smbclient to backup and restore data.

refsect2.title: amstar
refsect2.para: The amstar application use star to backup and restore data.

refsect1.title: AUTHORS
refsect1.para: Jean-Louis Martineau &email.jlm; and Dustin J. Mitchell &email.dustin;: Original text
